    Testing Ecological Patches

    Testing Polygons Association

    Lucas da Cunha Godoy

    01-24-2017

    Testing if two sets of polygons have some kind of association is not an easy task. The proof of that is that we don’t have a method to do it implemented in neither in R or ArcGIS. So, my dissertation was motivated by a request from researchers from ESRI (the company from ArcGIS) to my advisor. In this work I developed an algorithm based on the paper from (Lotwick and Silverman 1982). The usage is illustrated below.

    Usage

    References

    Lotwick, HW, and BW Silverman. 1982. “Methods for Analysing Spatial Processes of Several Types of Points.” Journal of the Royal Statistical Society. Series B (Methodological). JSTOR, 406–13.
